channel.title: [562] Yell
channel.description:
I need help adding a command, I want to a "Veteran" yell command, where I can just set a players name and they will have veteran, for example: I wanted to give "veteran player" the yell so I do something like this: [CODE]if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("veteran_player")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=FFCC33><img=1><img=1>[Veteran]<img=1><img=1>"+player.getDisplayName()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));[/CODE]
But that is for the "CommandPacketHandler" (Console one) not "CommandsPacketHandler" (Chat one) So how can I make one for CommandsPacketHandler? I tried using the one above, but I just get errors.

item.title: [562] Yell
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

I need help adding a command, I want to a “Veteran” yell command, where I can just set a players name and they will have veteran, for example:
I wanted to give “veteran player” the yell so I do something like this:

if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("veteran_player")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=FFCC33><img=1><img=1>[Veteran]<img=1><img=1>"+player.getDisplayName()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));

But that is for the “CommandPacketHandler” (Console one) not “CommandsPacketHandler” (Chat one)
So how can I make one for CommandsPacketHandler?
I tried using the one above, but I just get errors.
